conversion of a power to a series of chebyshev polynomials*even slowly convergent power series can berearranged as series in chebyshev polynomials if appropriate sequence transformations are used in evaluatingthe coefficients the method is illustrated by computing the coefficients for the expansionof the logarithm and dilogarithm.cacm march 1964thacher jr h c.ca640323 jb march 10 1978 2:05 am249 4 1109254 4 1109272 4 11091102 4 11091109 4 11091140 4 11091188 4 11091306 4 11091464 4 11091491 4 11091767 4 11091781 4 11091787 4 11091949 4 1109321 4 11092059 4 11092126 4 1109435 4 1109437 4 1109463 4 1109483 4 1109491 4 11092732 4 1109560 4 1109583 4 11093073 4 1109627 4 1109631 4 1109632 4 1109642 4 1109644 4 1109653 4 1109680 4 1109761 4 1109762 4 1109763 4 1109123 4 1109140 4 1109919 4 1109989 4 1109196 5 11091109 5 11091109 5 11091109 5 1109
